    a click on a resource sets it to green, indicating that it has been selected
    void updateLeader()
    shows the 4 random leader that the player has to choose from
    void updateWarehouse()
    some players have to choose a bonus resource that has to be placed in the warehouse, this function updates the warehouse with the chosen resource
